name: 怕不怕趴喵霸霸 Ghost Party Nyanbaba
name_original: 怕不怕趴喵霸霸 Ghost Party Nyanbaba
description:
Story background:

Nyanbaba from cat girl star drove a UFO to the earth. She accidentally scalded her tongue when drinking milk tea just after landing. The angry nyanbaba said he would use magic to fight back against mankind!

Introduction to the game:

This is a very cute click game to find hidden items!

The game player plays the weak and stupid human, investigates suspicious hidden objects in various styles, and does not let Nyanbaba's magic trick succeed.

Some of them are illogical and strange, and some are lovely monsters.

Please be sure to find all suspicious places within the time, otherwise the villain cat demon nyanbaba will suddenly jump out to frighten the players!

When nyanbaba does not appear after thorough investigation, the completion percentage of the scene will be accumulated.

Game features:

When customs clearance fails, nyanbaba, a frightened cat demon, will pop out suddenly, accompanied by a very lovely Chinese dubbing!

10 different scenes, each containing 20 hidden items.

Different from everyone's fault finding, it is not the reference and comparison between the left and right of the two pictures, but a single picture, with a wider field of vision.

The number of hidden items in the scene each time is random and does not tell the player the remaining number.

After playing each scene repeatedly and accumulating 100%, the button to enter the two week eye mode will appear.

The number of hidden items in the second week eye increases and the time decreases.

One second will be deducted for each mistake.

Some simple and interesting hidden achievements.

The process is not long. You can get a refund if you don't like it.

Suitable for family fun of all ages.

The rules are simple and there is no language understanding barrier.

Because the personal charm of the cat demon may lead to the mental retardation of some players, and the symptoms are deliberate failure.



制作组名单（Developer list）：
策划：冷笑黑妖
角色美术：超美味柑橘茶
场景美术：一留留
程序：零号
配音：犯困的橘猫
界面：真真
